body: No, I don't think that was his bed. They were at HER place (those were her sisters, I'm sure.) And he had some fond memories there. They fucked on her bed, one of the places they used to share their memories. Nao put this all on himself, in all honesty. HE rejected her out of fear. HE said he'd be their observer. This is on him. She isn't a whore either. He said that they should just remain friends from now on. She's clearly weak minded, so she probably thought that it wasn't any use trying to pursue him any further, and when she was feeling down, this dude came in. Nao unfortunately made his bed.

Wait...wtf is this? Did that asshole really fuck her in HIS bed and make him watch. Yeah...no, that's not  a "best friend". Nao, drop the both of them and move on with your life. He's an asshole just shoving it in your face and she's a whore that was never serious about you or she would never given up so easily. She also wouldn't be subjecting him to this shit if she truly cared. If there was another chapter, it should be Nao dropping their asses and telling them to get lost. They don't care about him.
What is this this not cool
